name: SpaceShifter (AnaDosSantos)
description:
Travel through the 4 dimensions and go back to the present to unravel the mysteries of the portal!

===============================================================

Intro

🚀 SpaceShifter is a Virtual Reality Puzzle game where the player takes the role of a scientist whose time travel experience has gone wrong. ☄️

🌌 It's up to you to find the cubes that are the main key to bring the portal to life again and travel through space and time! ⌚

🌙 Solve puzzles, explore the environment and travel to a different time or dimension to find what you need to accomplish your goal. 💫

===============================================================

Synopsis

You'll find yourself alone and trapped in a laboratory in the middle of space. 

Take on the role of a scientist whose job was to create six different types of cubes and use them in a portal to be able to travel through space and time, but an accident happened and the portal “exploded”.

Try to find your way back as you remain lost in a different dimension and you try to find the other 5 cubes that are dispersed in space and time to be able to return to your original dimension.

===============================================================

Controls

===============================================================

Awards

🏆 "Prémio 42", Over & Out 2021, Lusofona University 🏆

===============================================================

Main Features:
  • Use the portal in combination with a time or space cubes to travel through time and/or space. 🌠
  • Explore the environment in VR (Virtual Reality).  🌌
  • Interact and solve problems in your environment to find out where the rest of the cubes are. 🚀

===============================================================

Team:

🚀 Diana Levay- Lead Programmer, Puzzle Designer, Marketeer

☄️Ana dos Santos - Lead Game Designer, UI and Cinematics

🌟 Joana Silva - Lead Artist, Sound Designer, Level Designer
